name: places/ChIJL_KGPQnzwokRbKjpwDWQ9JM
formattedAddress: 5000 Broadway Side Entrance, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 5000 Broadway Side Entrance, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
After working out here I don't think I could ever go back to a commercial gym. This is a great gym. It is never too full so there is little to no waiting for machines/stations. The owners are incredible and they have created a wonderful community within the gym.

I was really nervous to start working out but everyone there made me feel so welcome. This gym has it all, no matter what level of fitness you are at.The classes are also a lot of fun too.

originalText.text: Infit Studios has been a wonderful new addition to the neighborhood! I am thrilled to have a place to work out that is only a block away and very reasonably priced. Jerry, the owner, is very friendly and caring about his clients’ well-being. I’ve been attending total body workout classes and personal training sessions with Jerry 4x per week for a few months and it is doing great things for my physical and mental health. Be aware that Infit is a small neighborhood studio and not a huge, fancy gym a la Equinox—there are no changing rooms or facilities to clean up, for example—but it has all the essentials for a solid workout, a lot of support if you don’t know your way around a gym, and is affordable and convenient. I highly recommend it!

originalText.text:
Great boutique gym in the neighborhood.  The huge signs that tell you where it is located when you get close to the business is perfect.  I don’t think I would have found the location without them.

The HIIT class with Jerry is good.  Class size was 6 people. Maybe 5 people working out in the morning in the gym area.

This neighborhood definitely needed a smaller gym.

FYI - The clock in the class room is 3 minutes fast.

originalText.text: InFit is such a positive and amazing gym. The trainers are absolutely welcoming and amazing people. The cycling and HIIT classes are just the cardio you need to start or complete your day not to mention therapeutic. The owners Jerry and Laura are beyond stellar. If you want to join a gym where there is friendliness, comfort, and a feeling of non-judgement this is the perfect gym to join. I recommend 1000%. Cannot thank them enough for helping me how they have in such a short time.

originalText.text: I absolutely LOOOOVE this place! It is my gym home and such an amazing, positive, encouraging and inspiring community. Every class I’ve taken has been a 10/10. Laura’s cycling class is a must! It is such an amazing experience for your mind, body and soul. This is my favorite gym!
